title: Shawn Messenger Fine Art Glass California Poppies Paperweight
description:
Glass artist Shawn Messenger describes her work as "gardens of glass," where you do not have to weed or water, and everything grows perfectly. If you get tired of the view, just turn the piece to find something new! Hand-blown glass using artist created murrini flowers, glass powders, and color chips. Made in Toledo Ohio.

3.5 in. D
